title: Is a Pixel 4 XL charging only one direction with the out of the box usb-c charger normal behavior?
content: My Google Pixel 4 XL only changes when it's plugged in one way with the usb-c cable provided in the box. While I see it has been an issue for some pixel 3 devices, I'm curious whether this is normal behavior for all pixel 4 XLs.
